bibl.title: Aurelius Neilammon alias Hiërax and Caecilius [Cons]ultius, Prefect of Egypt, in a Case of Extortion (P. Strasb. VI 560).
bibl.note: P. Stras. 560 (post 27 October 324 p.C.): text, translation and notes (identification of the defendant and dating of the Prefect, 324 or the beginning of 325).
SIRKS A.J. Boudewijn, Aurelius Neilammon alias Hiërax and Caecilius [Cons]ultius, Prefect of Egypt, in a Case of Extortion (P. Strasb. VI 560).
